Desc.eng: Say good-bye to your friend, stranger! We are about to begin the ritual.
How could I be so blind? You are the true monsters here, and I will stop you now.
Hold your horses, old man. Someone has stolen a runestone from the well, where this creature dwells. We found the stone. Put it back and the angry spirit will sleep again.
Hold your horses, old man. Someone has stolen a runestone from the well, where this creature dwells. We found the stone and we put it back. Problem solved.
Stop this! We have destroyed the Spirit of the Deep. No need for this insanity!
I was right! You were a gift from the mountain spirits! And now we will show them our appreciation and feed them with fresh blood! Bring us someone we can sacrifice!
I was right! You were a gift from the mountain spirits! And now we will show them our appreciation and feed them with fresh blood! Bring us someone we can sacrifice!
You did what? I am humbled, restless on! You must be an even more powerful spirit, the goddess of the starless nights! Let us worship you with blood. We will sacrifice you a mortal immediately!
That's enough! You are the true monsters here, and I will stop you now.
How could I be so blind? You are the true monsters here, and I will stop you now.
